{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR5453 |revision= |upc=738168037124 |ean= |asin=B000F6M24Q |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/14/2006 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=NHPUSR5453 |ic_id=550A-15035 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2313A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640BTTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S561632E-TC75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=tp3-tx, tp7-rx |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2313A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=USR5453 Internal Network |default_ssid_regex=^USR5453 Internal Network$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:C0:49,00:14:C1 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Professional Access Point''
{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=5453}} "USR5453", "VER:A0-1", and "11514USR54531A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=30578 How to flash US Robotics 5453 ??? - DD-WRT Forums] (part numbers) {{TechInfoDepot|USRobotics_USR5453}} Per the [http://www.usr.com/support/5453/5453-ui/basic_setup.htm USR web interface emulator], the default SSID is 'USR5453 Internal Network'.
